TopicTitle: Planet pack problem, I've tried Kopernicus thread

Articles.Content: If somebody wants to work with me on a planet pack, he/she should let me know. If not, I hope somebody can help me with a problem I'm having. On my planet texture I've got these black spots on the planet: http://picpaste.com/screenshot8-vmVho3gy.png. I hope somebody knows how to fix this.

That's due to you using a heightmap. Manipulating the PQS could fix it, I suppose.

I haven't made planets in a while, but I know that this used to be a common thing.
Thanks I'll try it out! What PQS Mod can add height to a planet without using a heightMap?
Also, when I don't use a heightmap, the height doesn't fit with the actual color map. For example, the height doesn't go down in a crater, you can see in map view!?

Thanks, I guess. But it doesn't tell me where to post all of that. I have quite some problem with my planet pack and I have been trying to fix some of them for weeks. After still not receiving anything on the Kopernicus thread AND the development thread I don't know what else you want me to do. So hopefully you can tell me where I have to post questions then?
I'm sorry, but if you ignore me even on this question, I can't change anything on posting thread, eh? I have no idea where I post them elsewhere and that's what I'm asking...
